traditional: 輕

traditional: 不可終日
bùkězhōngrì be unable to carry on even for a single day; be in a desperate situation

traditional: 告終
gàozhōng end; reach an end

traditional: 始終
shǐzhōng from beginning to end; all along

traditional: 年終
niánzhōng (n) year-end

traditional: 最終
zuìzhōng final; ultimate

traditional: 終年
zhōngnián entire year; age at death

traditional: 終日
zhōngrì all day long

traditional: 終究

traditional: 終結
zhōngjié end

traditional: 終身

traditional: 終點

traditional: 自始至終
zìshǐzhìzhōng from start to finish
yìnxìn credential
